players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she's the mafioso. We should vote for her to protect the town."
Diana: "Alice, I am the real detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafioso. He's lying to save himself."
You: "I need more info. Why did each of you choose to investigate the other?"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana because she seemed suspicious right from the start. She's lying to save herself as the mafioso. Trust my findings and vote for her."
Diana: "Alice, Charlie investigated me before any discussion - how could I seem suspicious? I investigated him because he was too eager to accuse. He's lying."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
